ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c &&
AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Category__c , "Tail Coverage"), ISPICKVAL( Category__c , "Coverage Extension") ), OR( ISBLANK( Endorsement_Effective_Date__c ), ISBLANK( Tail_Expiration_Date__c) ), OR( ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "Bind Order Sent"), ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "Delivered to Insured") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Tail Coverage/Coverage Extension requires a Endorsment Effective Date and an Endorsement Expiration Date
